headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein® Production Facility
summary: Solar Foods launches their first facility to produce Solein, a protein created from air via gas fermentation.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M to Scale Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Modern Synthesis secures funding to expand its production of vegan materials grown with microbes.

headline: Remilk Announces US Expansion with New Production Facility
summary: Remilk plans to build a new production plant in the USA to increase its production of animal-free dairy.

headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods receives investment to scale up their precision-fermentation produced dairy alternatives.

headline: Natural Fiber Welding Partners with Textile Giant for Mirum® Expansion
summary: NFW collaborates with a major textile firm to increase production and adoption of their Mirum material.

headline: MycoWorks Announces New Reishi™ Material for Automotive Interiors
summary: MycoWorks expands the applications of its Reishi mushroom leather to include automotive interiors.
